pageContext.claim: “Democrats must change our immigration laws right now. Right now. We can do it in -- I used to say 45 minutes, we can do it in 15 minutes. It's very simple.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims it would be easy to quickly make a deal -- 45 minutes. But there is relatively little support in Congress for many of his anti-immigration proposals. When the Senate voted in 2018 on different options, Trump's plan received the fewest number of votes, including many Republican "nay" votes.
